description: Non-Material Amendment to Planning Permission ref: 20/00825/FUL (Variation of Conditions 2, 3, 4, 6, 8, 9, 13, 14, 20, 22, 34 & 36 of Planning Permission ref: 17/14178/FUL for amendments to wording (Please see covering letter dated 6th April). Amendment to consist of addition of externally recessed rainwater pipes to front and rear facades of Block H Maisonettes. Colour of pipes to match proposed brickwork
decision_conditions: Conditions 2, 3, 4, 6, 8, 9, 13, 14, 20, 22, 34 & 36 of Planning Permission 20/00825/FUL are as follows:The approved development shall be carried out in accordance with the following drawings/details: D0010 SITE LOCATION PLAN AND PROPOSED BUILDING Rev P1 21002-FA-ABH-00-DR-A-0100 BLOCK H - EXTERNAL RWP LOCATIONS GF PLANRev P121002-FA-ABH-03-DR-A-0103 BLOCK H - EXTERNAL RWP LOCATIONS ROOF PLAN Rev P121002-FA-ABH-01-DR-A-0101 BLOCK H - EXTERNAL RWP LOCATIONS FIRST FLOOR PLAN Rev P121002-FA-ABH-02-DR-A-0102 BLOCK H - EXTERNAL RWP LOCATIONS 2ND FLOOR PLAN Rev P1D0001 SITE LOCATION PLAN Rev P1552 PARKING VARIATIONS EAST ELEVATION AND WEST FACING ELEVATION Rev P121002-FA-ABH-ZZ-DR-A-3680 BLOCK H - EAST ELEVATION - RWP POSITIONS Rev P121002-FA-ABH-ZZ-DR-A-3681 BLOCK H - WEST ELEVATION - RWP POSITIONS Rev P1Reason: For the avoidance of doubt and in the interests of proper planning.
